General_Description: '''Blood Muscles''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: On a [[message board]], Kassandra found a note about a contract: "[[Sparta]]n [[Strategos|Strategoi]] are the most dangerous unit in the enemy's forces. They can't be left alive."
Section_Outcome: Kassandra sought out and slew Spartan Strategoi all over [[Greece]], gaining rewards for doing this.
Section_Behind_the_scenes: This very same contract appears also under the names [[Spartan Fury]] and [[Target of Choice - Spartan Strategoi]].
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
